alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:06PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Travis, Bastrop, southeastern Lee and northern Fayette Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 605 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wyldwood to near Paige to near Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bastrop, Giddings, Smithville, Round Top, Camp Swift, Circle D-KC Estates, Cedar Creek, Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway, Wyldwood, Paige, Upton, Webberville, Carmine, Phelan, Bastrop State Park, Hills Prairie, Northrup, Garfield, Rockne and Watterson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
